attributes.action: Continue the planned referendum on Britain's membership of the EU.
attributes.additional_details: Considering that most of the country wants this decided once and for all, therefore this represents a rare and overwhelming mandate by the people for a vote to take place.
attributes.background: According to the wishes of the British Public (as of always) all parties & the Prime Minister David Cameron have declared their support for Britain to vote on European Union membership, even with the Neville Chamberlin style reform package negotiated by the Prime Minister taken into consideration.
